release.change: Added a share button to the articles page for sharing content on social media platforms.
Article URL's can now be shortened before sharing by enabling "Short links" in the settings menu.
Fix for a bug causing crashing at random intervals on a few devices.
A counter totalling the number new subscribed headlines has been added to the subscribers button.
The subscribers headline list now retrieves and lists only new headlines first, improving loading times.
Subscribed news source's headlines can now be viewed in a combined, single list.
New button added to the bottom of the Source page to access your subscribed news headlines.
Article timezones have been addressed and should now be converted to your local time.
